title: Bikerumor Pic Of the Day: Paris, France
content:
Photo submitted by Nocolas Gabriel of their Specialized Diverge seemingly suspended in mid-air on work created by street artist Jr on the Place du Trocadéro in Paris. “L’artiste street art Jr a conçu une nouvelle œuvre qui joue avec notre œil. Visible depuis le mercredi 19 mai, son anamorphose est située sur la place du Trocadéro à Paris. Cette œuvre éphémère était visible jusqu’au 17 juin 2021. Le Specialized Diverge a l’air suspendu dans le vide.”

We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

*Please note that public spaces and parks may have restrictions or be closed to the public due to COVID-19, please check before heading out.
author: Kristi Benedict
